section3.Paragraph3/2: There may be different price modalities for access to the program that will be detailed on the web at the time of registration.

section4.Paragraph4/1: To place an order on our website it is necessary to register during the purchase process

section4.Paragraph4/3: These data will be processed and incorporated into our files, as reported in our personal data protection section contained in the

section4.Paragraph4/6: The payment method provided for contracting our services is through a credit card but we will not request them until after the trial period of two weeks (14 days).
section4.Paragraph4/7: Once the trial period has passed, you will be asked for the information regarding the card in order to make the payment
section4.Paragraph4/8: Once notification is received confirming the effective contracting of the product or service, you will be informed of the procedure for accessing it.
section4.Paragraph4/9: The payment method currently offered by this website is exclusively by credit card, using the Stripe platform.
section4.Paragraph4/10: For your peace of mind, you are guaranteed absolute security, since both your personal data and those of your card are encrypted thanks to the secure SSL server provided by this platform.
section4.Paragraph4/11: Likewise, at no time does our company receive your card details, only the confirmation of your payment.
section4.Paragraph4/12: The technical purchase system allows the identification and rectification of errors before making the purchase. It also allows information on delivery restrictions and payment methods for the products sold on this website.
section4.Paragraph4/13: The justification of the receipt of the product by the recipient will be through the IP and purchase order.
section4.Paragraph4/14: In the system of the purchase process of our products, there is all the information of the process.
section4.Paragraph4/15: It will be considered that the sales contract is signed with the acceptance of the informed consent.
section4.Paragraph4/16: The consumer will receive confirmation by email that the procedure has been completed.

section5.Paragraph5/1: By registering on, accessing, or otherwise using this website, you agree to be bound by the terms below.
section5.Paragraph5/2: The mere use of this website implies knowledge and acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. In some particular cases, we may also ask you to explicitly accept it.

Paragraph9: Notwithstanding the foregoing, you may forward our newsletter in electronic format to other persons who may be interested in visiting our website.

section11.Paragraph11/1: By visiting our website, you agree to use it only for its intended purposes and as permitted by these Terms, any additional agreements with us, and applicable laws, regulations, and generally accepted online practices and industry guidelines.
section11.Paragraph11/2: You must not use our website or services to use, post or distribute any material that consists of (or is linked to) malicious computer software; use data collected on our website for any direct marketing activities, or carry out any systematic or automated data collection activities on or in connection with our website

section12.Paragraph12/1: You can sign up for an account on our website.
section12.Paragraph12/2: Durante este proceso, se le solicitará que elija una contraseña y un PIN. Usted es responsable de mantener la confidencialidad de las contraseñas y la información de la cuenta y se compromete a no compartir sus contraseñas, la información de la cuenta o el acceso seguro a nuestro sitio web o servicios con ninguna otra persona.

section12.Paragraph12/4: You must notify us immediately if you become aware of the disclosure of your password.
section12.Paragraph12/5: After account termination, you will not attempt to register a new account without our authorization.
section12.Paragraph12/6: The registration date will be the start date of the contract regardless of the day of collection.

Paragraph13: You have the right to withdraw from the contract within 30 days without indicating the reason, this return period is divided as follows: the first 14 days you can use the application or software without any limitation and without entering bank details. After these 14 days, you will be asked for your card number
Paragraph14: With the free registration, «free 14-day trial» or similar that could be used in the future, the contract is understood to have been concluded, so the rights and obligations are contracted at the time of registration without it being necessary to formalize anything else.

section15.Paragraph15/1: The withdrawal period will expire 15 days after the conclusion of the contract
section15.Paragraph15/2: To exercise the right of withdrawal, you must inform us of your decision to withdraw from this contract by means of an unequivocal statement to the email angel@leggado.es.
section15.Paragraph15/3: It can also be done through the user section of the personal profile of the software or application.
section15.Paragraph15/4: To comply with the withdrawal period, it is enough that you send your communication about the exercise of the right of withdrawal before the withdrawal period expires to the email angel@leggado.es

section16.Paragraph16/1: If you withdraw from the contract, we will refund the payments you have made, without undue delay and, in any event, no later than 14 days from the day we are informed of your decision to withdraw from the contract.
section16.Paragraph16/2: We will make said reimbursement using the same means of payment that you used for the initial transaction, except force majeure, in any case, you will not incur any commission as a result of said reimbursement.
section16.Paragraph16/3: If you have requested the start of the execution of the services during the withdrawal period, you must pay us an amount proportional to what was provided until you have notified us of your withdrawal from this contract, in comparison with the total coverage thereof.
section16.Paragraph16/4: Once the refund is requested, a screenshot of the refund made will be sent by email. Keep in mind that the payment platform (Stripe) usually takes between 7 and 10 days for it to appear in your account.
section16.Paragraph16/5: Please note that there are some legal exceptions to the right of withdrawal and therefore some items cannot be returned or exchanged. We will inform you if this applies to your particular case.

section17.Paragraph17/1: We can establish, create or transform accounts into «lifetime» or lifetime accounts, this type of account is a single payment and you will have access to the application as long as it continues to work and support is offered by the professional or company that is in the direction
section17.Paragraph17/2: Lifetime or lifetime account is not during the life of the user who registers

Paragraph24: Without prejudice to our other rights under these Terms and Conditions, if you breach these Terms and Conditions in any way, we may take any action we deem appropriate to address the breach, including temporarily or permanently suspending your access to the Website, by contacting your Internet Service Provider to request that they block your access to the Website, and/or take legal action against you

section33.Paragraph33/1: 1.- REGULATION (EU) 2016/679 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of April 27, 2016 regarding the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and the free circulation of these data and by which Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) is repealed
section33.Paragraph33/2: 2.- Correction of errors of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of April 27, 2016, regarding the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and the free circulation of these data and which repeals Directive 95/46/CE (General Data Protection Regulation).
section33.Paragraph33/3: 3.- Organic Law 3/2018 of December 5 on the Protection of Personal Data and guarantee of digital rights.
